description: This file defines a React component 'CardList' for rendering and managing a list of Kanban cards within a column, supporting drag-and-drop reordering and card addition. It also includes a nested component 'DnDKanbanCard' for individual card drag-and-drop functionality.

methods.name: CardList
methods.description: Main React component for displaying a list of Kanban cards with drag-and-drop and add card functionality.

methods.name: DnDKanbanCard
methods.description: Component wrapping individual KanbanCard with drag-and-drop capabilities for reordering and moving between columns.
